Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to longevity bonuses for members of the uniformed service with the New York city fire department
Summary: Provides for salary bonuses for members of the uniformed service with the New York city fire department who retire with at least twenty-five, thirty or thirty-five years of service.
LawCode: Add ยง15-110.1, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to longevity bonuses for members of the uniformed service with the New York city fire department
